1240490.name: Parallel Catastrophes Chronicles
1240490.description:
You play as a special forces operative sent in to take back a mining operation that was seized by terrorists, as soon as you enter the mine shaft you end up in a parallel dimension, but something seems a little off. You jump back and forth between the two dimensions trying to get back to the city of Parallel, only time will tell if you make it back or not.

Below are a list of features included in the game.

- The game offers save states which can then be loaded during game play or the main menu anytime.

- You can have up to 8 save slots.

- There are 7 different levels to play through.

- There is one difficulty but the game does provide a fair challenge for players.

- There are files spread throughout the game that help explain the lore of the game.
1240490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
